titles: Albions England a continued historie of the same kingdome, from the originals of the first inhabitants thereof: and most the chiefe alterations and accidents there hapning: vnto, and in, the happie raigne of our now most gracious soueraigne Queene Elizabeth. VVith varietie of inuentiue and historicall intermixtures. First penned and published by VVilliam VVarner: and now reuised, and newly inlarged by the same author.
author: Warner, William, 1558?-1609.
publisher: Printed by the widow Orwin, for I[oan] B[roome] and are to be sold at her shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Bible,
notes: "An addition in proese to the second booke of Albions England", X6v-Y8v.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
